title: Profit Table Request
description: Retrieve a summary of account Profit Table, according to given search criteria

contract_type.description: Return only contracts of the specified types

description.description: If set to 1, will return full contracts description.

limit.description: Apply upper limit to count of transactions received.

passthrough.description: Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: Used to map request to response.
